thread.title: Future’s New HNDRXX Features Rihanna, Weeknd: See the Full Tracklist
thread.title_full: Future’s New HNDRXX Features Rihanna, Weeknd: See the Full Tracklist

author: Jazz Monroe
title: Future’s New HNDRXX Features Rihanna, Weeknd: See the Full Tracklist
text:
Future’s New HNDRXX Features Rihanna, Weeknd: See the Full Tracklist Watch his new music video for FUTURE ’s “Draco” Future Photo By Prince Williams/ Wireimage 
Future has revealed the tracklist for HNDRXX , the surprise follow-up to last week’s self-titled LP . Like FUTURE , there are 17 songs. Featured on the record are Rihanna and the Weeknd . Check out the full tracklist below. Scroll down for his new video for FUTURE ’s “Draco.” It’s directed by the RiTE Brothers . A post shared by Future Hendrix (@future) on Feb 22, 2017 at 12:51pm PST Artists In This Story
